meanings.definition: A man who engages in promiscuous or illicit sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: The wencher was known for his numerous affairs.
meanings.sent2: She was warned to stay away from the wenchers at the party.
meanings.sent3: The gossip about the wencher's escapades spread quickly.
meanings.sent4: In the world of the wenchers, loyalty was a foreign concept.
meanings.sent5: The town's most infamous wencher was finally caught red-handed.

meanings.definition: To engage in promiscuous or illicit sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: He decided to wencher around town after the breakup.
meanings.sent2: They were caught wenchering in the park late at night.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends joked about who would wencher first.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was wenchering her way through life.
meanings.sent5: The scandalous novel depicted characters who loved to wencher.
